abstract: General Electric will cut its dividend to 10 cents a share in the third quarter. The move will save $9 billion a year.
snippet: General Electric will cut its dividend to 10 cents a share in the third quarter. The move will save $9 billion a year.
lead_paragraph: For the first time since the Depression, General Electric will cut its dividend, striving to preserve cash in uncertain times, the company announced on Friday.

headline.main: On the Defensive, G.E. Will Reduce Its Dividend
headline.print_headline: On the Defensive, G.E. Will Reduce Its Dividend
